nodes.text: Noelle was a woman, who lived on the planet Cularin shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire.

Noelle was a friend of the Jedi Knight Lora Nadad. Following the end if the Clone Wars, the surviving Jedi went into hiding and Nadad hid out in Jax Warehouse on Cularin. Noelle stayed there with her, along with Ledis and Klide, some of Nadad's other friends. Noelle was present there when the heroes of Cularin traveled to the warehouse.
Noelle was tall and big-boned, with blonde hair. Her eyes had a vacant look.
